Title: Enacts "Kimberly's Law"; repealer
Summary: Enacts "Kimberly's Law" establishing certain sex offenses, including sex offenses against children; relates to criminal sentencing for defendants convicted of certain sex offenses; repeals certain laws relating to sex offenses against children.
LawCode: Rpld ยง130.35 sub 3, ยง130.50 sub 3, amd Pen L, generally; amd ยง168-a, Cor L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law and the correction law, in relation to establishing certain sex offenses and criminal sentencing for defendants convicted of certain sex offenses; to repeal subdivision 3 of section 130.35 of the penal law, relating to rape of a child less than 11 years old; and to repeal subdivision 3 of section 130.50 of the penal law, relating to a criminal sexual act with a child less than 11 years old
